Quick search

tsio.io.db module¶

DBIO class for reading/writing TimeSeries from/in MongoDB collections.

class DBIO(host_address, db_name, collection_name)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for reading/writing time series in MongoDB.

Parameters:
  • host_address (str) – Address of the MongoDB daemon.
  • db_name (str) – MongoDB database name.
  • collection_name (str) – MongoDB collection.
attribute_names(ts_names=None)[source]¶

Return set of attribute names in the database.

Parameters:ts_names (list(str), optional) – Optional list of time series names to be used for searching attributes. Default is None (use the entire database).
Returns:All the attribute names in ts_names or in the database.
Return type:list(str)
ensure_index(attributes)[source]¶

Create database index for an attribute.

Useful to improve performance of attribute matching with the select method.

Parameters:attributes (list(str)) – Attribute names for index creation.
in_db(ts)[source]¶

Check if a time series is in the database.

Parameters:ts (TimeSeries) –
Returns:Whether there is a time series with the same name in the database.
Return type:bool
read(ts_collection, components=True, depth=inf)[source]¶

Read time series attributes and values from the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be read.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be read and instantiated. Default is all components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component instantiation. depth = 1 means no components are instantiated. Default is infinity.
read_all_attribute_values(attributes=None)[source]¶

Return set of attribute values in the database.

Parameters:attributes (list(str), optional) – Attribute names whose values are to be retrieved. Default is None (use all attribute names in the database).
Returns:All the attribute values of attributes or of all the attribute names in the database.
Return type:list(str)
read_attributes(ts_collection, components=True, depth=inf, attributes=None)[source]¶

Read time series attributes from the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be read.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be read and instantiated. Default is all components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component instantiation. depth = 1 means no components are instantiated. Default is infinity.
  • attributes (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of attribute names to be read. Default is all attributes.
read_values(ts_collection, components=True, depth=inf)[source]¶

Read time series values from the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be read.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be read and instantiated. Default is all components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component instantiation. depth = 1 means no components are instantiated. Default is infinity.
remove(ts_collection, components=False, depth=inf, confirm=True)[source]¶

Remove time series from the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be removed.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be removed. Default is no components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component removal. depth = 1 means no components are removed. Default is 1.
  • confirm (bool, optional) – Confirm before removing. Default is True.
search(**kwargs)[source]¶

This method is not yet implemented.

select(mode='AND', available_dates=None, all_fields=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get time series names matching attribute specifications.

Parameters:
  • mode ({"AND", "OR"}, optional) – Whether to match attributes with “AND” or “OR”. Default is “AND”.
  • available_dates (list(date-like), optional) – If not None, return only names of time series that have values at these dates. Default is None.
  • all_fields (bool, optional) – Whether to return time series with the “FIELD” attribute. Default is False.
  • kwargs (dict, optional) – Dictionary of {attribute_name: attribute_value} pairs to match.
Returns:

Names of time series matching the passed specifications.
Return type:

list(str)
write(ts_collection, components=True, depth=inf)[source]¶

Write time series attributes and values to the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be written.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be written. Default is all components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component writing. depth = 1 means no components are written. Default is infinity.
write_attributes(ts_collection, components=True, depth=inf)[source]¶

Write time series attributes to the database.

Parameters:
  • ts_collection (type convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – Time series to be written.
  • components (list(str), optional) – Optional collection of component names to be written. Default is all components.
  • depth (int, optional) – Depth of component writing. depth = 1 means no components are written. Default is infinity.
convert_to_ts_collection(ts)[source]¶

Convert a time series list-like object into TimeSeriesCollection

Parameters:ts (TimeSeries, TimeSeriesCollection, str, list (str, TimeSeries)) –
Returns:Object built with the passed time series list-like.
Return type:TimeSeriesCollection
instantiate_components(ts, components, ts_collection)[source]¶

Convert inplace the string values in the ‘Components’ dict of a time series into time series objects.

Also stores these components in a given time series collection.

Parameters:
  • ts (TimeSeries) – Time series.
  • components (list(str)) – List of component names to instantiate (keys of the ‘Components’ dict).
  • ts_collection (TimeSeriesCollection) – A time series collection to store the instantiated components.
ts_attributes_to_dict(ts)[source]¶

Convert a TimeSeries ts_attributes element into a dict.

Parameters:ts (TimeSeries) – Time series.
Returns:Dictionary ready to be written in MongoDB.
Return type:dict
ts_to_dict(ts)[source]¶

Convert TimeSeries to dict, for writing in the database.

Parameters:ts (object convertible to TimeSeriesCollection) – A time series.
Returns:Dictionary ready to be written in MongoDB.
Return type:dict
ts_values_to_dict(ts)[source]¶

Convert a TimeSeries ts_values element into a dict.

Parameters:ts (TimeSeries) – Time series.
Returns:Dictionary ready to be written in MongoDB.
Return type:dict
